User navigate to "https://staging2-cpraedcourse.gitview.net/register" for SingleUser registration
User enters the following valid existing registration details:

User should not be navigated to the dashboard page

elements.name: TC_04 Navigate to Registration Page from Login Page

steps.name: User navigates to the login page "https://staging2-cpraedcourse.gitview.net/user/login?version=v2"
User clicks on the Register Here link
User should be redirected to the registration page
User enters the following valid registration details:
User agrees to the Terms and Privacy Policy
User clicks on the Register Now button
User should redirected to the dashboard Page
User navigates to the login page "https://app.cpraedcourse.com/user/login?version=v2"
User enters valid login credentials:
User clicks on the Login button
User should redirected to the dashboard

User enters invalid login credentials:
User clicks on the Login button
User should see an error message "The Username/Password combination doesn't match. Please try again."

arguments.val: "The Username/Password combination doesn't match. Please try again."

elements.name: TC_09 Navigate to Reset Password Page

steps.name: User navigates to the login page "https://app.cpraedcourse.com/user/login?version=v2"
User clicks on Click Here to Reset
User should redirected to the Reset Password page
User enter the Username/Email as "priya@thinktime.in"
User hit the Send Instructions
User should see the message "Instructions have been emailed on how to reset your password."

arguments.val: "Instructions have been emailed on how to reset your password."

elements.name: TC_15 Registration with Valid Details and Course Completion

steps.name: User navigate to "https://staging2-cpraedcourse.gitview.net/register" for SingleUser registration
User enters the following valid registration details:
User agrees to the Terms and Privacy Policy
User clicks on the Register Now button
User is on the "Are you a Healthcare Provider? " page
User selects "Yes, I am a healthcare provider"
User should be navigated to the "Please choose your profession" page
User selects the profession as "Doctor / Physicians"
User should be navigated to the Course Selection page
User selects the course as "Combo Healthcare Provider BLS"
User lands on the Course Page
User taps on the Take Quiz button
User lands on the Quiz Page
User attends all the 20 questions
User taps on the Submit Quiz button
User lands on the Quiz Success Page
User taps on Continue to Download Card
User lands on the Payment Page
User enters the following payment card details:
User taps on Next button
User lands on the Billing and Shipping Address Page
User enters the following shipping and billing details:
User taps on the Same as Billing Address radio button
User taps on the Submit Payment button
User lands on the Continuous Education Credits and Course Renewal Page

elements.name: TC_16 Verify if the user can purchase course with add-ons

steps.name: User navigate to "https://staging2-cpraedcourse.gitview.net/register" for SingleUser registration
User enters the following valid registration details:
User agrees to the Terms and Privacy Policy
User clicks on the Register Now button
User is on the "Are you a Healthcare Provider? " page
User selects "Yes, I am a healthcare provider"
User should be navigated to the "Please choose your profession" page
User selects the profession as "Doctor / Physicians"
User should be navigated to the Course Selection page
User selects the course as "Combo Healthcare Provider BLS"
User lands on the Course Page
User taps on the Take Quiz button
User lands on the Quiz Page
User attends all the 20 questions
User taps on the Submit Quiz button
User lands on the Quiz Success Page
User taps on Continue to Download Card
User lands on the Payment Page
User enters the following payment card details:

User lands on the Billing and Shipping Address Page
User enters the following shipping and billing details:
User taps on the Same as Billing Address radio button
User taps on the Submit Payment button
User lands on the Continuous Education Credits and Course Renewal Page
User taps on I Accept
User lands on the Hands-on Kit Page
User taps on the I Accept button
User lands on the Congratulations Page
